title: Hongshao Carnitas Tacos
source: The Book of Sichuan Chili Crisp - Jing Gao
categories: The Book of Sichuan Chili Crisp - Jing Gao
ingredients: - ¼ cup / 60ml crema or sour cream
directions: 1. Ensure the braised pork belly is cool enough to handle. Using tongs or a fork, remove and discard the big pieces of dry spices and tear the pork shoulder into shreds.
2. To make the sauce: In a small bowl, mix the crema fresca with the chili crisp and set aside.
3. To assemble the tacos: When ready to serve, heat the tortillas in a pan on the stove over low to medium heat, two at a time. Sprinkle the cheese directly on the tortilla and melt.
4. Divide the shredded cabbage and meat filling evenly across the eight tortillas.
5. Top with the sauce and some pickled pineapples.
6. Garnish with the cilantro, if using, and enjoy!
